summary: A bartender comes back to his hometown after his parents die, and finds himself in a dangerous situation involving a mysterious woman and a violent criminal.
cast: Anton Yelchin|Zooey Deschanel|John Hawkes|Alia Shawkat|Frank Langella|Ciarán Hinds|Aubrey Plaza|Benjamin Rogers|Primo Allon|Gary Hetherington|Lucia Frangione|Elika Portnoy|Amitai Marmorstein|Philip Granger|Duncan Ollerenshaw|Eric Keenleyside|Samantha Ferris|John Innes|Linda Darlow|Aaron Douglas|Christine Willes|Frank C. Turner|Jeremy Raymond|Nikolai Witschl|Britt Irvin|Libby Osler|Carolyn Adair|Jesse Haddock
title: La región inmóvil
